OOC: Sorry, I didnt hear you ask. He's the original G1 Megatron, and has
nothing to do with the BW Megatron. He was seperated from the Galvatron
who was in this rpg.

BIC:
Megatron tried desperatly to get up, and strangle the ignorant robot,
but moving caused his joints to tear, and they would need a second to
reajust. Then the stun gun hit him, and caused him to roll over. He
began to lose conciousness, his eyes dimming. "n..no." He whispered.
"Emergency....protocall." He commanded. Then his computer hummed to
life, "Agnolidged." Megatron's eyes faded, but the computer countinued
to work. "All remaining energy to failsafe's." Megatron's body began to
twitch involountarily, and then began to shrink, transforming into his
smaller gun mode. Luckily he had, because the enrgy wave then hit,
sending the gun spiralling away. Thanks to his smaller mass though it
caused less dammage then ussual.

Spasstik stopped his barrage, when he received a message from Soundwave
who was monitoring the battle. He began to bound towards the Welker
firearm.

Rampage grabbed his head from the tearing pain that came from the energy
wave, trying to force it out. "Ahhhh, yes, the pain, I can feel it." And
he began to cackle madly again. He then noticed what was happening near
Transmutate. He clenched his fists, as his horrible face showed anger.
"NO, no one will claim his spark again. He stays." and he pointed his
gatling gun at Hellpeon, letting it rotate a couple of times, then
firring three rocketes at the speeding robot.
